translation: And he who serves Me with unwavering devotion, he, crossing beyond the dualities, is fit for becoming Brahman.
commentary: 14.26 Me Me? f and? who who? Unswerving uncompromisingly? bhaktiyogena with devotion? serves serves? Sah he? Gunan Gunas? transcendent crossing beyond? Etan these? Brahmabhuyaya for becoming Brahman? Kalpate is fit.Commentary A Sannyasi or even a Karma Yogi who serves Him (the Isvara? Narayana Who abides in the hearts of all beings) with unswerving devotion? is endowed with the knowledge of the Self. He then goes
